#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	char s1[1010],s2[1010];
	int a[26] = {0};
	int i;
	cin >> s1 >> s2;
	for(i = 0;s1[i] != '\0';i++)
		a[s1[i] - 97]++;
	for(i = 0;s2[i] != '\0';i++)
		a[s2[i] - 97] = 0;
	for(i = 0;i < 26;i++)
	{
		if(a[i] > 0)
			cout << char(i+97) << a[i];
	}
	cout << endl;
	return 0;
}
